posts.post_content:
Selling my T209 Hawkins. Looking for [strike]$100[/strike] sold on  this card.  I accept PayPal friends and family or  regular.   Price is net to me, so please add 3% for regular PayPal.   Shipping and  insurance is on me for US addresses, I will work with you if you are in  another country.

It never hurts to make an offer, so feel free to PM or e-mail with   questions, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing negotiations.   Thanks for looking.
Waiting on an offer.  You never know, the worst that can happen is I say thanks, but no.
